org.transitime.core

Class ServiceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.core.ServiceUtils

  • public class ServiceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    For working with service types, such as determining serviceId or appropriate block to use for a given epoch time.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceUtils

        public ServiceUtils(DbConfig dbConfig)
        ServiceUtils constructor. Creates reusable GregorianCalendar and sets the timezone so that the calendar can be reused.
        Parameters:
        timezoneName - See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_zones

    • Method Detail

      • getDayOfWeek

        public int getDayOfWeek(java.util.Date epochTime)
        Returns day of the week. Value returned will be a constant from jvaa.util.Calendar such as Calendar.TUESDAY.
        Parameters:
        epochTime -
        Returns:
        Day of the week

      • getServiceIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getServiceIds(java.util.Date epochTime)
        Determines list of current service IDs for the specified time. These service IDs designate which block assignments are currently active.
        Parameters:
        epochTime - The current time that determining service IDs for
        calendars - List of calendar.txt GTFS data
        calendarDates - List of calendar_dates.txt GTFS data
        Returns:
        List of service IDs that are active for the specified time.
